import React from 'react'; import './Header.css'; // Import the CSS file const HeaderContent = () => { return (
Hi!
I'm CL, a multi-disciplinary designer, engineer, and entrepreneur. I'm passionate about Storytelling, HCI, and Innovation.

I love working in multi-disciplinary teams and learning from others. I am not the famous F1 driver but I have a track record of bringing bold ideas from 0 to 1 and have done so in startups and corporations. Backed by a strong design and software engineering foundation, I lead hands-on and secure stakeholder buy-in.

This page presents some of my 0 to 1, get in touch to learn more.
Talks
AI for Humans @Google Paris
Multi-modal design @UC Berkeley
Companies
Ubisoft, BBC, Cookpad, ARx, Kodama
Contact Me
); }; export default HeaderContent;
